author: Thomas D. Williams, Ph.D.
description: President Trump called on Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan to intervene to secure the release of U.S. Christian pastor Andrew Brunson.
title: President Trump Urges Turkey’s Erdogan to Release Jailed Christian Pastor

title: Trump Uses Presser With Turkish President To Defend Divulging Intel To Russia
